name: BELAY ON
description:
Is the premiere climbing experience, wrapped up in one, easy-to-digest compu-videotorial package. Climb as ALEX HANDHOLD, a cool climber with his head in the game, and control his belayer TOMAS COLDVEIL, to get Alex to the mountain's summit safely!

Submitted for the GMTK2021 jam with the theme, "Joined Together".
